notifications.error: Email address is invalid or already exists!

login.emailIncorrectError: The email you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
login.loginFailError: The login information you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
login.passwordIncorrectError: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
login.passwordResetPrompt: We'll send a reset link to your inbox.
login.noRolesSubTitle: Please, contact your manager and try again.

batchFilter.noBatches: There are no batches for this model
batchFilter.maxBatches: You can filter up to 6 batches at a time

healthToolTips.accuracy: The Accuracy Health Score is based on the F1 score or mean average error, depending on the model’s output type.
healthToolTips.ingestion: The Ingestion Health Score is based on the variance of time period and volume between ingestion events.
healthToolTips.drift: The Drift Health Score is based on the average anomaly score for the model’s inferences.

modelStatusToolTips.pending: Model creation will begin soon. Please check back for updates.
modelStatusToolTips.creating: Model creation is in-progress. Please check back for updates.
modelStatusToolTips.ready: Your model is ready to receive inferences.
modelStatusToolTips.creationFailed: Model creation failed. Please re-try creating the model or contact support if the problem persists.
modelStatusToolTips.unknown: Model status is unknown. Please check back for updates or contact support if the problem persists.

drift.title: Data Drift
drift.emptyMessage: as an Enrichment to activate the feature importance chart
drift.featureImportanceLabel: Identify which of your model’s attributes have the most impact on your predictions.
drift.attributeDistributionLabel: Compare the distribution of the reference and real-world data sets for the selected model attribute.
drift.subtitle: View the stability of your model by comparing the incoming real-world data against the reference data set

charts.emptyMessage: There is no data for the selected parameters. Please adjust your filters or metric.

keyMetricsOptions.activeModelsToolTip: Models currently being evaluated within the Arthur platform.
keyMetricsOptions.inferencesToolTip: Each inference is composed of input features, prediction values, and (optionally) ground truth values and any non-input data.
keyMetricsOptions.criticalAlertsToolTip: Metric-based rules that have been designated as a 'critical' level of severity.
keyMetricsOptions.warningsToolTip: Metric-based rules that have been designated as a 'warning' level of severity.
keyMetricsOptions.insightsToolTip: Insights are generated by Arthur's proprietary algorithms to surface new patterns and learnings uncovered that require review.

models.emptyStateBodyTop: Upload a model to start measuring performance
models.toolTip: See the most recently created models in your organization.

baseline.selectOneFairnessBaseline: Select 1 as the fairness baseline for the attribute

segmentationModal.selectCategories: Select up to 6 categories you want to segment by
segmentationModal.selectionLimitMessage: You’ve reached the limit of selecting 6 categories.

modeSelector.subtitle: Choose between viewing your model’s data over time or as an overall aggregation.

performance.title: Performance
performance.subtitle: See how your model is performing across a number of evaluation metrics

modelDeleteModal.note: Note: deleting this model will remove it for all users within your organization and delete any associated inferences an data permanently.
modelDeleteModal.warning: Once deleted you cannot undo this action.
modelDeleteModal.loading: Delete process may take a while, do not close this window.

alertRuleModal.tooltip: For every alert rule, you can optionally apply filters groups which are just applied filters on an object. Let say if you want to be alerted for low accuracy rate for females. Then the filter group applied would be sex = female.
alertRuleModal.alertFor: I want to create an alert for
alertRuleModal.name: I want this alert to be named
alertRuleModal.notificationsMessage: Alert notifications are done via email. To change your notification settings or configure Integrations like PagerDuty, visit the

overview.modelHealthTooltip: Assess your model’s health across performance, ingestion, and drift. Hover over each metric category to learn about the calculations and values.
overview.recentAlertsTooltip: See up to 3 of the model’s most recent critical and warning alerts. Click on a card to view alert details.
overview.recentInsightsTooltip: See up to 3 of the model’s most recent insights. Click on a card to view insight details.
overview.noCriticalAlerts: No Critical Alerts are set up
overview.noWarningAlerts: No Warning Alerts are set up
overview.insightsEmptyState: No Insights present. Make sure the Hotspots enrichment in order to turn insights surveillance.

resetPassword.passwordLinkNotice: We’ll send a reset link to your inbox
resetPassword.resetLinkNotice: A password reset email will be sent to {{email}} if an account associated with this email exists in our system.
resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.genericError: Something went wrong. Please contact your system administrator.

account.invitationFailure: There was a problem sending your invitation. Please contact your administrator.
account.accountDeletedPrompt: It can take up to 24 hours to completely remove all the data associated with your account.
account.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this member?
account.sorryToseeYouGo: We are sorry to see you go!
account.noticeOfDeletion: Note, once your account is deleted there is no going back. All of your models, inferences, and metrics will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
account.appreciateIt: We’d appreciate it if you let us know why you are deleting your account:

signup.getInsightsExpanded: Track performance metrics like accuracy and recall to detecting deeper issues like data drift. Bias detection and mitigation, as well as model explainability tools are also available.
signup.liftBurdenExpanded: Fast and easy solution to spend less time babysitting production ML and more time solving interesting problems.
signup.termsAndPolicies: By checking this box and clicking the “Create an account” button below, you acknowledge that you have read and reviewed the <1>Terms of Service</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3> and agree to be subject to those terms and policies.

errors.firstName: First name is a required field.
errors.forbidden: Public signup isn’t available yet. If you’re interested in trying out Arthur please reach out to us at feedback@arthur.ai
errors.existingOrganization: This organization already exists. Please reach out to your admin to get an invite to your organization or enter a unique organization name to continue.
errors.existingUser: A user with this email already exists. You can try to Sign in.
errors.lastName: Last name is a required field.
errors.termsAndPolicies: Please agree to our terms and policies.

emailVerification.prompt: Hi {{name}}! We sent a verification link to {{email}}. Please check your email, or click on the button below to verfiy your email address and start using Arthur Element.
emailVerification.reminderPrompt: Hi {{name}}! We sent a verification link to {{email}}. Please check your email, or click on the button below to resend the verification email.
emailVerification.reminderTitle: It looks like you haven't verified your email yet
emailVerification.title: Verify your email address

usage.limitReached: You’ve just reached the model limit. Upgrade so you can upload more models, increase the number of inferences, or add new organization members.
usage.submitRequestForUpgrade: To request an upgrade please email
usage.arthurTeamWillContact: An Arthur team member will contact you shortly.
usage.requestPlanUpgrade: To change your plan, request a plan change, please contact your Org Admin or Model Owner.

onboarding.emailUs: We want to hear from you! Send us your feedback: feedback@arthur.ai
onboarding.hearFromYou: We want to hear from you! Send us your feedback: feedback@arthur.ai
onboarding.hereAreResources: Here are some helpful resources for you to get started
onboarding.learnDetails: Explore how to integrate with Arthur and get the most out of your production models
onboarding.practiceWithOne: Practice with one of our in-depth examples on GitHub
onboarding.productText: Start with our product tutorials to speed up your work with Arthur
onboarding.readyToUploadModel: Ready to upload your own model?
onboarding.tryArthur: Try Arthur by uploading a simple example model

customAlerts.noCustomAlerts: No alert rules defined for this Model
customAlerts.noAlertsTriggeredForModel: No alerts have been triggered for this model
customAlerts.createAnAlert: Create an alert rule and we’ll notify you when your data meets those conditions.
customAlerts.alertsWillBeShownOnceTriggered: Alerts will be shown here once triggered and will also be sent via email

manageAlertRules.title: Manage Alert Rules
manageAlertRules.subtitle: Define or update this model’s alert rules and the logic here. You can also check notification settings under Notification Channels.

alerts.emptyAlertsColumn: Change an alert’s status by dragging and dropping the alert card between the different columns
alerts.showLastTwoWeeks: Shows the last 14 days of new alerts triggered
alerts.alertsBoardExplaination: An alerts board displays your org’s alerts as cards you can move between columns. The columns on this board represent the status of your org’s alerts. This visual helps you discuss and track the progress of alert remediation.
alerts.alertsNotificationsChannelDescription: Integrate Arthur alerting with your incident response tools to streamline your model monitoring operations.
alerts.pagerDutyTitle: Get PagerDuty notifications when Model Alerts are triggered. To learn how it works, please check out our
alerts.pagerDutyEmailError: The Pagerduty destination address must include @pagerduty.com at the ends
alerts.serviceNowTitle: Get Servicenow notifications when Model Alerts are triggered. To learn how it works, please check out our
alerts.serviceNowEmailError: The Servicenow destination address must include @servicenow.com at the ends

notificationChannels.title: NOTIFICATION CHANNELS
notificationChannels.notifications: For this model, you receive notifications via:
notificationChannels.changeSettings: To change your integrations settings or enable other tools, visit
notificationChannels.notFound: No matches for this email at this org. Contact your administrator to provision access for this email.

alertModal.allAttributes: {{metric}} for Top 6 Attributes with Most Drift
alertModal.title: ALERT DETAILS

sendAlertDetails.userNotFound: No matches for this email at the organization. Sending this alert detail view will also invite the recipient to sign up for Arthur.

insights.insightsInfo: Insights are proactive notifications about your model’s performance.  For example, once you’ve enabled the Hotspots enrichment you’ll receive insights about regions of your data space where model accuracy has significantly degraded.

testSuite.inputsAndOutputs: Uploaded Input Prompts and Reference Outputs
testSuite.getStarted: Get started by downloading the Python Package or exploring our documentation

benchResources.pythonText: View our Github source package which includes ReadMe & QuickStart guides
benchResources.apiText: Explore how to integrate with Arthur’s API endpoints and get most out of your models
benchResources.supportText: Email us your questions and we will contact you
